system:
note description: "[ Objects that provide access to constants for RTF documents and formatting. ]" legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2013-01-25 16:40:46 -0800 (Fri, 25 Jan 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 90880 $"
class interface ../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xmlEV_RICH_TEXT_CONSTANTS_I
create Falsedefault_create
feature -- Access
f_color_table_start../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_color_table_startColor_table_start: FalseSTRING_32 = "{\colortbl ;" -- RTF string denoting start of color table.
f_font_table_start../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_font_table_startFont_table_start: FalseSTRING_32 = "{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\uc1\deff0\deflang1033{\fonttbl" -- RTF string denoting start of font table.
f_rtf_highlight_string../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_highlight_stringRtf_highlight_string: FalseSTRING_32 = "highlight" -- String denoting highlighting color in RFT.
f_rtf_color_string../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_color_stringRtf_color_string: FalseSTRING_32 = "cf" -- String denoting color in RTF.
f_rtf_unicode_string../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_unicode_stringRtf_unicode_string: FalseSTRING_32 = "u" -- String denoting underlined in RTF.
f_rtf_underline_string../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_underline_stringRtf_underline_string: FalseSTRING_32 = "ul" -- String denoting underlined in RTF.
f_rtf_underline_none_string../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_underline_none_stringRtf_underline_none_string: FalseSTRING_32 = "ulnone" -- String denoting end of underlined in RTF.
f_rtf_strikeout_string../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_strikeout_stringRtf_strikeout_string: FalseSTRING_32 = "strike" -- String denoting striked out in RTF.
f_rtf_bold_string../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_bold_stringRtf_bold_string: FalseSTRING_32 = "b" -- String denoting bold in RTF.
f_rtf_italic_string../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_italic_stringRtf_italic_string: FalseSTRING_32 = "i" -- String denoting italic in RTF.
f_rtf_vertical_offset../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_vertical_offsetRtf_vertical_offset: FalseSTRING_32 = "up" -- String denoting start of vertical offset in RTF.
f_rtf_font_string../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_font_stringRtf_font_string: FalseSTRING_32 = "f" -- String denoting font index in RTF.
f_rtf_font_size_string../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_font_size_stringRtf_font_size_string: FalseSTRING_32 = "fs" -- String denoting font size in RTF.
f_space_string../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_space_stringSpace_string: FalseSTRING_32 = " " -- String denoting empty space.
f_rtf_new_paragraph../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_new_paragraphRtf_new_paragraph: FalseSTRING_32 = "pard" -- String denoting start of standard paragraph.
f_rtf_paragraph_left_aligned../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_paragraph_left_alignedRtf_paragraph_left_aligned: FalseSTRING_32 = "ql" -- String denoting start of left aligned paragraph.
f_rtf_paragraph_center_aligned../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_paragraph_center_alignedRtf_paragraph_center_aligned: FalseSTRING_32 = "qc" -- String denoting start of center aligned paragraph.
f_rtf_paragraph_right_aligned../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_paragraph_right_alignedRtf_paragraph_right_aligned: FalseSTRING_32 = "qr" -- String denoting start of right aligned paragraph.
f_rtf_paragraph_justified../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_paragraph_justifiedRtf_paragraph_justified: FalseSTRING_32 = "qj" -- String denoting start of justified paragraph.
f_rtf_paragraph_left_indent../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_paragraph_left_indentRtf_paragraph_left_indent: FalseSTRING_32 = "li" -- String denoting left indent of paragraph.
f_rtf_paragraph_right_indent../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_paragraph_right_indentRtf_paragraph_right_indent: FalseSTRING_32 = "ri" -- String denoting right indent of paragraph.
f_rtf_paragraph_space_before../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_paragraph_space_beforeRtf_paragraph_space_before: FalseSTRING_32 = "sb" -- String denoting space before paragraph.
f_rtf_paragraph_space_after../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_paragraph_space_afterRtf_paragraph_space_after: FalseSTRING_32 = "sa" -- String denoting space after paragraph.
f_rtf_family_tech../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_family_techRtf_family_tech: FalseSTRING_32 = "ftech"
f_rtf_family_tech_int../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_family_tech_intRtf_family_tech_int: FalseINTEGER_32 = 1
f_rtf_family_roman../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_family_romanRtf_family_roman: FalseSTRING_32 = "froman"
f_rtf_family_roman_int../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_family_roman_intRtf_family_roman_int: FalseINTEGER_32 = 2
f_rtf_family_swiss../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_family_swissRtf_family_swiss: FalseSTRING_32 = "fswiss"
f_rtf_family_swiss_int../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_family_swiss_intRtf_family_swiss_int: FalseINTEGER_32 = 3
f_rtf_family_script../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_family_scriptRtf_family_script: FalseSTRING_32 = "fscript"
f_rtf_family_script_int../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_family_script_intRtf_family_script_int: FalseINTEGER_32 = 4
f_rtf_family_modern../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_family_modernRtf_family_modern: FalseSTRING_32 = "fmodern"
f_rtf_family_modern_int../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_family_modern_intRtf_family_modern_int: FalseINTEGER_32 = 5
f_rtf_family_nill../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_family_nillRtf_family_nill: FalseSTRING_32 = "fnill"
f_rtf_family_nill_int../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_family_nill_intRtf_family_nill_int: FalseINTEGER_32 = 6
f_rtf_newline../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_newlineRtf_newline: FalseSTRING_32 = "par" -- String denoting RTF newline.
f_rtf_backslash../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_backslashRtf_backslash: FalseSTRING_32 = "\\" -- String denoting RTF backslash.
f_rtf_open_brace../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_open_braceRtf_open_brace: FalseSTRING_32 = "\{" -- String denoting RTF open brace.
f_rtf_close_brace../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_close_braceRtf_close_brace: FalseSTRING_32 = "\}" -- String denoting RTF close brace.
f_rtf_unicode_character../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_unicode_characterRtf_unicode_character: FalseSTRING_32 = "\u" -- String denoting starting of a Unicode character.
f_rtf_red../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_redRtf_red: FalseSTRING_32 = "red" -- String denoting red component of a RTF color.
f_rtf_green../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_greenRtf_green: FalseSTRING_32 = "green" -- String denoting green component of a RTF color.
f_rtf_blue../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_blueRtf_blue: FalseSTRING_32 = "blue" -- String denoting blue component of a RTF color.
f_view_text../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_view_textView_text: FalseSTRING_32 = "\viewkind4\uc1\pard" -- A STRING constant representing the view type of the RTF document.
f_default_font../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_default_fontDefault_font: FalseSTRING_32 = "\cf1\highlight2\f0\fs"
f_rtf_control_character../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_control_characterRtf_control_character: FalseCHARACTER_8 = '\'
f_rtf_open_brace_character../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_open_brace_characterRtf_open_brace_character: FalseCHARACTER_8 = '{'
f_rtf_close_brace_character../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_close_brace_characterRtf_close_brace_character: FalseCHARACTER_8 = '}'
f_rtf_fonttable../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_fonttableRtf_fonttable: FalseSTRING_32 = "fonttbl"
f_rtf_colortbl../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_colortblRtf_colortbl: FalseSTRING_32 = "colortbl"
f_rtf_charset../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_charsetRtf_charset: FalseSTRING_32 = "fcharset"
f_rtf_user_props../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_user_propsRtf_user_props: FalseSTRING_32 = "*"
f_rtf_info../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_infoRtf_info: FalseSTRING_32 = "info"
f_rtf_stylesheet../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_stylesheetRtf_stylesheet: FalseSTRING_32 = "stylesheet"
f_rtf_font_charset../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_constants_i_short.xml#f_rtf_font_charsetRtf_font_charset: FalseSTRING_32 = "fcharset"
